original_text: After that, she had lived alone until she was 84 years old. Now she never left the temple. She stayed there day and night to worship God. She fasted and she prayed.
korean_text: 과부가 되고 팔십사 세가 되었더라 이 사람이 성전을 떠나지 아니하고 주야로 금식하며 기도함으로 섬기더니

sentences.original_text: After that, she had lived alone
Now she never left the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그녀는 결코 성전을 떠나지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: She stayed there day and night
